<script type="text/javascript">var _sf_startpt=(new Date()).getTime();</script>
<meta name="description" content="Millions of children have no access to education, work long hours under hazardous conditions and are forced to serve as soldiers in armed conflict. They suffer targeted attacks on their schools and teachers or languish in institutions or detention centers, where they endure inhumane conditions and assaults on their dignity. Young and immature, they are often easily exploited. In many cases, they are abused by the very individuals responsible for their care. We are working to help protect children around the world, so they can grow into adults." />
<meta name="generator" content="Drupal 7 (http://drupal.org)" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://www.hrw.org/topic/childrens-rights" />
<link rel="shortlink" href="https://www.hrw.org/taxonomy/term/9683" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Human Rights Watch" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://www.hrw.org/topic/childrens-rights" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Children&#039;s Rights" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Millions of children have no access to education, work long hours under hazardous conditions and are forced to serve as soldiers in armed conflict. They suffer targeted attacks on their schools and teachers or languish in institutions or detention centers, where they endure inhumane conditions and assaults on their dignity. Young and immature, they are often easily exploited. In many cases, they are abused by the very individuals responsible for their care. We are working to help protect children around the world, so they can grow into adults." />

<meta name="twitter:description" content="Millions of children have no access to education, work long hours under hazardous conditions and are forced to serve as soldiers in armed conflict. They suffer targeted attacks on their schools and teachers or languish in institutions or detention centers, where they endure inhumane conditions and assaults on their dignity. Young and immature, they are often easily exploited. In many cases, they are abused by the very individuals responsible for their care. We are working to help protect children around the world, so they can grow into adults." />

  <div id="main">

      
      <div id="main-content" class="clearfix">
        
        
        
        
            
  <header class="l--constrained--padded clearfix landing-page-header">
    <nav class="dropdown dropdown--local"><a href="/topic/childrens-rights" class="dropdown-link toggle active">Explore Children&#039;s Rights</a></nav><h1 class="title--large">Children&#039;s Rights</h1>
  </header>

  <div class="section--summary landing-page-summary is-inverse l--constrained--wide">
    <div class="l--constrained clearfix">
              <div class="l-primary">
          
<div class="summary"><p>Millions of children have no access to education, work long hours under hazardous conditions and are forced to serve as soldiers in armed conflict. They suffer targeted attacks on their schools and teachers or languish in institutions or detention centers, where they endure inhumane conditions and assaults on their dignity. Young and immature, they are often easily exploited. In many cases, they are abused by the very individuals responsible for their care. We are working to help protect children around the world, so they can grow into adults.</p>
</div>
        </div>
      
              <div class="l-secondary">
          
<figure class="topic-image">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/topic/public/topic_image/childrens-rights.jpg?itok=qyh97XzZ" width="1400" height="480" alt="" /></figure>

<div class="copyright">
  @2010 David Høgsholt/Reportage by Getty Images for Human Rights Watch</div>
        </div>
          </div>
  </div>

  <div class="section--featured is-inverse l--constrained--wide">
    <div class="l--constrained--padded clearfix">
      <div class="view view-featured-content view-id-featured_content view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-4ea4768f163bc81dc9d9807b657e16cb">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">    <ul class="list--3up">          <li class="views-row-odd views-row-first list-item"><article class="article--featured clearfix node node-news" data-eq-pts="medium: 450"  about="/news/2017/02/14/tanzania-15-million-adolescents-not-school" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

    </figure>

<h2 class="heading--ruled">News</h2>

<div class="view view-latest-content view-id-latest_content view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-358d9cc032945d250d5a6ab4218bb3dd">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">    <ul class="list--ruled">          <li class="views-row-odd views-row-first list-item">
<article class="node node-news node-teaser article--teaser clearfix"  about="/news/2017/04/17/secondary-school-displaced-kids-shouldnt-be-afterthought" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
    <div class="article-content">
    <div class="dateline--small"><time class="date" datetime="2017-04-17T09:23:00-04:00">April 17, 2017</time> <span class="type">Commentary</span></div>
          <h3 class="title"><a href="/news/2017/04/17/secondary-school-displaced-kids-shouldnt-be-afterthought">Secondary School for Displaced Kids Shouldn’t be an Afterthought</a></h3>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Secondary School for Displaced Kids Shouldn’t be an Afterthought" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
          <footer class="article-footer">
                  <address class="article-authors--byline">
            
  <div class="field field--field-shared-author">
    <article class="node node-profile byline--simple clearfix"  about="/about/people/susan-raqib" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
      <h4 class="name">
              Susan Raqib          </h4>
  <span property="dc:title" content="Susan Raqib" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>      <span class="position">Associate, Children&#039;s Rights</span>
  </article>
  </div>
          </address>
                          <div class="article-source">
            <span class="article-source-label">Published In:</span> <cite>
  <a href="http://www.ineesite.org/en/blog/secondary-school-for-displaced-kids-shouldnt-be-an-afterthought" target="_blank">INEE</a></cite>
          </div>
              </footer>
      </div>
</article>
</li>
          <li class="views-row-even list-item">

    </figure>
    <div class="article-content">
    <div class="dateline--small"><time class="date" datetime="2017-04-13T00:01:00-04:00">April 13, 2017</time> <span class="type">Dispatches</span></div>

<div class="view view-promo-boxes view-id-promo_boxes view-display-id-panel_pane_3 view-dom-id-f312328b9cc2b9db27d296e3273ae748">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
      <article class="promo--featured block--promo clearfix node node-promo-box"  about="/promo/295064/endchildmarriage" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" data-eq-pts="large: 728">
        <span property="dc:title" content="#EndChildMarriage" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
          <figure class="article-image">
                  <a href="https://www.hrw.org/EndChildMarriage">
        
                  <img data-src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/16x9_small/public/multimedia_images_2016/p201504wrd_bangladesh_childmarriage_final_05_0.jpg?itok=4fWuH9PP" class="js-unveil" width="374" height="210" typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/all/themes/hrw/img/lazy_loader.gif" alt="Loading Photo" />          <noscript><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/16x9_small/public/multimedia_images_2016/p201504wrd_bangladesh_childmarriage_final_05_0.jpg?itok=4fWuH9PP" width="374" height="210" alt="#EndChildMarriage" /></noscript>
        
                  </a>
              </figure>
    
    <div class="block-content">
      <h3 class="title">        <a href="https://www.hrw.org/EndChildMarriage">
            #EndChildMarriage              </a>
      </h3>
              <div class="promo-body">
          <p><a href="https://www.hrw.org/EndChildMarriage">15 million girls marry as children each year. Demand an end to child marriage.</a></p>
        </div>
                    <div class="promo-link link--all">
          <a href="https://www.hrw.org/EndChildMarriage">Join the call</a>        </div>
          </div>
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last">
      <article class="promo--featured block--promo clearfix node node-promo-box"  about="/promo/293235/education-syrian-refugee-children" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" data-eq-pts="large: 728">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Education for Syrian Refugee Children" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
          <figure class="article-image">
        
                  <img data-src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/16x9_small/public/multimedia_images_2016/2016-07-mena-lebanon-photo-04.jpg?itok=nONwW_aW" class="js-unveil" width="374" height="210" typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/all/themes/hrw/img/lazy_loader.gif" alt="Loading Photo" />          <noscript><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/16x9_small/public/multimedia_images_2016/2016-07-mena-lebanon-photo-04.jpg?itok=nONwW_aW" width="374" height="210" alt="Education for Syrian Refugee Children" /></noscript>
        
              </figure>
    
    <div class="block-content">
      <h3 class="title">      Education for Syrian Refugee Children      </h3>
              <div class="promo-body">
          <p>The series "<a href="https://www.hrw.org/tag/education-syrian-refugee-children">Preventing A Lost Generation</a>" examines barriers to education for Syrian refugee children in Jordan, Lebanon, and Turkey.</p>
        </div>
                </div>
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>
</div><div  class="pane">
<h2 class="heading--twitter heading--ruled--small">On Twitter</h2>

<a class="twitter-timeline" href="https://twitter.com/hrw" data-widget-id="729794690443268096" data-chrome="noheader nofooter noborders transparent" data-link-color="#0b81c3" height="400">Tweets</a>
</div><div  class="pane">
<h2 class="heading--ruled--small">Our People</h2>


  <div class="field field--field-shared-featured-researcher">
    <article class="node node-profile node-sticky has-image byline--expanded clearfix"  about="/about/people/zama-neff" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
      <figure class="byline-image">
      <a href="/about/people/zama-neff">
        <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/square_small/public/media/images/photographs/Zama_Cousen-Neff_web.jpg?itok=raNAFLS1" width="108" height="108" alt="Zama Neff" />      </a>
    </figure>
        <h4 class="name">
              <a href="/about/people/zama-neff">
              Zama Neff              </a>
          </h4>
  <span property="dc:title" content="Zama Neff" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>      <span class="position">Executive Director, Children’s Rights Division</span>
        <a href="https://twitter.com/ZamaHRW" class="link--twitter">ZamaHRW</a>
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="field field--field-shared-featured-researcher">
    <article class="node node-profile has-image byline--expanded clearfix"  about="/about/people/jo-becker" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
      <figure class="byline-image">
      <a href="/about/people/jo-becker">
        <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/square_small/public/multimedia_images_2015/2015_jo-becker_01_web-bio.jpg?itok=YYeVQqZq" width="108" height="108" alt="Jo Becker" />      </a>
    </figure>
        <h4 class="name">
              <a href="/about/people/jo-becker">
              Jo Becker              </a>
          </h4>
  <span property="dc:title" content="Jo Becker" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>      <span class="position">Advocacy Director, Children&#039;s Rights Division</span>
        <a href="https://twitter.com/jobeckerhrw" class="link--twitter">jobeckerhrw</a>
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="field field--field-shared-featured-researcher">
    <article class="node node-profile has-image byline--expanded clearfix"  about="/about/people/bede-sheppard" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
      <figure class="byline-image">

    </figure>
        <h4 class="name">

</div><div  class="pane">
<div><div class="view view-daily-brief view-id-daily_brief view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-2d79acd973ca8ec51ecc9bea655f8d14">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div>
    <a href="/the-day-in-human-rights/2017/04/18" class="link--block">
  <article class="brief--teaser clearfix" data-eq-pts="large: 728">
          <figure class="brief-image">
        <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/16x9_small/public/multimedia_images_2016/leopoldolopezphoto.jpg?itok=YAKCPnCP" width="374" height="210" alt="US Mosque Attack In Syria; Repressive Climate In Turkey: HRW Daily Brief" />      </figure>
        <header class="brief-header">
      <h3 class="title">Daily Brief</h3>
      <time class="date" datetime="2017-04-18T06:33:07-04:00">April 18, 2017</time>
    </header>
          <div class="brief-content">
        <div class="brief-summary">
          <p>US mosque attack in Syria; repressive climate in Turkey; Thailand's junta targets critics; reporter in hiding after exposing Chechnya's gay purge; Venezuela in crisis; Ethiopia rejects UN investigation into protest deaths; campaign of terror in Burundi; no secondary education for refugee kids; &amp; hitherto inaccessible Holocaust files made public.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      </article>
</a>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div></div>
</div><div  class="pane">
<h2 class="heading--ruled--small">Interactives <a href="/video-photos/search?mm_type[0]=interactive" class="link--all">More Interactives</a></h2>

<div><div class="view view-latest-interactive view-id-latest_interactive view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-ab44f1989f14fab2caa3428f91e42e5b">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">    <ul class="list--ruled">          <li class="views-row-odd views-row-first list-item">
<article class="node node-interactive node-promoted multimedia interactive--teaser clearfix"  about="/video-photos/interactive/2015/10/08/exodus-asylum-seekers-flee-europe" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
    <span property="dc:title" content="Exodus: Asylum Seekers Flee Into Europe" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>      <figure class="interactive-image">
      <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/square_small/public/multimedia_images_2015/2015_10_mm_desperate_journey_1.jpg?itok=X-4XJgSM" width="108" height="108" alt="Exodus: Asylum Seekers Flee Into Europe" />    </figure>
    <div class="interactive-content">
    <div class="date--small"><time datetime="2015-10-08T12:18:48-04:00">October 8, 2015</time></div>
      <h3 class="title"><a href="/video-photos/interactive/2015/10/08/exodus-asylum-seekers-flee-europe">Exodus: Asylum Seekers Flee Into Europe</a></h3>
          <p class="subtitle--tiny">“What will happen to us?” “Will they fingerprint us?” was the constant refrain as we watched a human wave of asylum seekers and migrants from Syria, Iraq, and Afghanistan crossing the Serbia-Hungary border. </p>
      </div>
</article>
</li>
          <li class="views-row-even list-item">
<article class="node node-interactive node-promoted multimedia interactive--teaser clearfix"  about="/video-photos/interactive/2014/12/24/unravelling-central-african-republic-crisis" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
    <span property="dc:title" content="THE UNRAVELLING: The Central African Republic Crisis" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>      <figure class="interactive-image">
      <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/square_small/public/media/images/photographs/CAR-feature_dec2014.jpg?itok=JzqdRR42" width="108" height="108" alt="THE UNRAVELLING: The Central African Republic Crisis" />    </figure>
    <div class="interactive-content">
    <div class="date--small"><time datetime="2014-12-24T17:00:46-05:00">December 24, 2014</time></div>
      <h3 class="title"><a href="/video-photos/interactive/2014/12/24/unravelling-central-african-republic-crisis">THE UNRAVELLING: The Central African Republic Crisis</a></h3>
          <p class="subtitle--tiny">The Unravelling: Journey Through The Central African Republic Crisis</p>
      </div>
</article>
</li>
          <li class="views-row-odd views-row-last list-item">
<article class="node node-interactive node-promoted multimedia interactive--teaser clearfix"  about="/video-photos/interactive/2013/05/17/schools-battlegrounds" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
    <span property="dc:title" content="Schools as Battlegrounds" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="interactive-content">
    <div class="date--small"><time datetime="2013-05-17T11:00:30-04:00">May 17, 2013</time></div>
      <h3 class="title"><a href="/video-photos/interactive/2013/05/17/schools-battlegrounds">Schools as Battlegrounds</a></h3>
          <p class="subtitle--tiny">In conflicts around the world, schools, students, and teachers are under attack. When schools are destroyed or students and teachers are threatened, children often drop out of school and don’t come back. </p>
      </div>
</article>
</li>
      </ul></div>    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div></div>
</div>      </div>
      </div>

  <div class="section--supplement landing-page-supplement">
    <div class="l--constrained--padded">
      <div  class="pane">
<h2 class="heading--ruled">Take Action</h2>

<div class="view view-take-action view-id-take_action view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-0d9881a262111b0b1ef2c4541906c02c">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div>
    <article class="node node-campaign node-teaser campaign--teaser clearfix"  about="/EndChildMarriage" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
      <figure class="campaign-image">
      <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/styles/square/public/multimedia_images_2017/dsc_1971-edit_0.jpg?itok=Sr1yRH1G" width="374" height="374" alt="End Child Marriage In New York" />    </figure>
    <div class="campaign-content">
          <h3 class="title--ruled">End Child Marriage In New York</h3>
    <span property="dc:title" content="End Child Marriage In New York" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>          <div class="campaign-summary">
        
  <div class="field field--field-shared-teaser">
    <p><strong>UPDATE:</strong> On February 28, New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that he would support reform on the age of marriage. On March 7, the New York Senate unanimously passed S.4407. The bill now must be passed by the Assembly and signed by the governor to become law. Please help us keep the pressure on!</p>
<p>	Did you know 14-year-olds can legally marry in New York State? From 2001 to 2010, nearly 4,000 teenagers under 18 married in New York. Research strongly links child marriage with dropping out of school, poverty, and mental and physical health problems. It is time something was done! This month, a new bill to crack down on child marriage was introduced in New York's state legislature. Please email Assembly Speaker Heastie &amp; Assembly Member Weinstein to tell them to support the bill.</p>
  </div>
      </div>
              
  <div class="field field--field-campaign-link">
    <a href="https://www.hrw.org/EndChildMarriage" class="link--action">Act Now</a>  </div>
      </div>
</article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>
</div>    </div>
  </div>
      </div>
    </div>

  <p class="donation-description">Human Rights Watch defends the rights of people in 90 countries worldwide, spotlighting abuses and bringing perpetrators to justice</p>

    function loadChartbeat() {
      window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
      var e = document.createElement('script');
      e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript');
      e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
      e.setAttribute('src',
         (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://s3.amazonaws.com/" : "http://") +
         "static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js");
      document.body.appendChild(e);
    }
    var oldonload = window.onload;
    window.onload = (typeof window.onload != 'function') ?
       loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
  })();

require=(function e(t,n,r){function s(o,u){if(!n[o]){if(!t[o]){var a=typeof require=="function"&&require;if(!u&&a)return a(o,!0);if(i)return i(o,!0);var f=new Error("Cannot find module '"+o+"'");throw f.code="MODULE_NOT_FOUND",f}var l=n[o]={exports:{}};t[o][0].call(l.exports,function(e){var n=t[o][1][e];return s(n?n:e)},l,l.exports,e,t,n,r)}return n[o].exports}var i=typeof require=="function"&&require;for(var o=0;o<r.length;o++)s(r[o]);return s})({103:[function(require,module,exports){
'use strict';

function _defineProperty(obj, key, value) { if (key in obj) { Object.defineProperty(obj, key, { value: value, enumerable: true, configurable: true, writable: true }); } else { obj[key] = value; } return obj; }

(function ($, Drupal) {
  $(document).ready(function () {
    var _flashvars;

    var flashvars = (_flashvars = {
      loop: 'On',
      navButtonsAppearance: '',
      mediaPlayerButtonColor: '0xB6534A',
      galleryBackgroundColor: '0x000000',
      navGradientAppearance: 'Hidden',
      navBackgroundAlpha: 1,
      contentFramePadding: 0,
      navLinkAppearance: 'Thumbnails',
      navThumbLinkSize: '44,30',
      navAppearance: 'Visible'
    }, _defineProperty(_flashvars, 'navButtonsAppearance', 'Hide Display Mode and Gallery Button'), _defineProperty(_flashvars, 'galleryAppearance', 'Hidden'), _defineProperty(_flashvars, 'captionTextSize', 14), _defineProperty(_flashvars, 'xmlFileType', 'Director'), _flashvars);
    if (typeof Drupal.settings.photo_essay !== 'undefined' && typeof Drupal.settings.photo_essay.album !== 'undefined') {
      flashvars.xmlFilePath = 'http://slideshowpro.hrw.org/images.php?album=' + Drupal.settings.photo_essay.album;
    }
    var params = {
      bgcolor: '#FFFFFF',
      allowfullscreen: true,
      wmode: 'opaque'
    };
    var attributes = {
      id: 'ssp-album',
      width: 994,
      height: 559
    };
    swfobject.embedSWF('http://slideshowpro.hrw.org/m/slideshowpro.swf', 'ssp-album', '994', '559', '9.0.0', false, flashvars, params, attributes);
  });
})(jQuery, Drupal);

},{}]},{},[103])

    var _flashvars;

    var flashvars = (_flashvars = {
      loop: 'On',
      navButtonsAppearance: '',
      mediaPlayerButtonColor: '0xB6534A',
      galleryBackgroundColor: '0x000000',
      navGradientAppearance: 'Hidden',

      contentFramePadding: 0,

      navAppearance: 'Visible'

      flashvars.xmlFilePath = 'http://slideshowpro.hrw.org/images.php?album=' + Drupal.settings.photo_essay.album;

      bgcolor: '#FFFFFF',
      allowfullscreen: true,
      wmode: 'opaque'
    };

      width: 994,
